newsitem.title: INDIA: India 12.59 percent 2004 stock on tap with RBI.
newsitem.headline: India 12.59 percent 2004 stock on tap with RBI.

text.p: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) said on Monday the 12.59 percent government of India 2004 security will be available on tap at its public debt office from June 25.
The stock will be issued for a minimum of 10,000 rupees (face value) and in multiples of 10,000, the RBI said in a statement released late on Monday.
"Interest on the government stock will be paid half-yearly and the stock repaid at par on June 18, 2004," it said.

It said the RBI will have full discretion to close the tap sale at anytime during banking hours or after the close of banking hours on or after June 25, 1997 and also to make partial allotment for applications received at the time of closure of sale.
The stock will be eligible for ready forward facility.
